trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see langword="My.Application.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" /> and <see langword="My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" /> events.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce i dati per gli eventi <see langword="My.Application.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" /> e <see langword="My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> and the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> events occur when the availability of the network changes.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventi si verificano quando la disponibilità di rete cambia.

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs> contains the new state of the network connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs> contiene il nuovo stato della connessione di rete.

trans-unit.source: To get the current state of the network connection, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere lo stato corrente della connessione di rete, utilizzare il <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates whether a network is available to the application.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> che indica all'applicazione se la rete è disponibile.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> and the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> events occur when the availability of the network changes.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventi si verificano quando la disponibilità di rete cambia.

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs> contains the new state of the network connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs> contiene il nuovo stato della connessione di rete.

trans-unit.source: To get the current state of the network connection, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere lo stato corrente della connessione di rete, utilizzare il <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a network is available to the application.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica all'applicazione se la rete è disponibile.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates whether a network is available to the application.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> che indica all'applicazione se la rete è disponibile.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> and the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> events occur when the availability of the network changes.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventi si verificano quando la disponibilità di rete cambia.

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs> contains the new state of the network connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs> contiene il nuovo stato della connessione di rete.

trans-unit.source: To get the current state of the network connection, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere lo stato corrente della connessione di rete, utilizzare il <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> proprietà.
